Andrew McNish

  1. Foster Name: Andrew Stoltz
  2. Foster Family: Samuel Fulton and Daisy Pearl Stoltz
  3. Location of Family: Richardson City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Holdrege, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 6
  7. Date of Birth: 4/23/1902, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 7/19/1961, Regina, SK, Canada
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: Mother died 1905; Moved to Canada as a boy.
  11. Source: Holdrege newspaper (unidentified), 6 August 1908; Find-A-Grave for Harold McNish Dravo; National Orphan Train Complex; Find-A-Grave; Eloise Thomsen Corres.; OTR 406 (also 405 and 40).
